6. Virgo - 4/10 - Virgos are analytical and hardworking, but can get bogged down in details and become overly critical.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Librans are diplomatic and charming, exceling at tasks that require social skills and conflict resolution.

9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Sagittarians are optimistic and adventurous, but can be reckless and impulsive at times.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Capricorns are responsible and driven, but can struggle with self-doubt and hesitation in the face of uncertainty.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Aquarians are humanitarian and innovative, bringing a unique perspective to creative tasks.
